items.sentence: I didn\'t tell Tom about it because I didn\'t want to ruin his day.
Tom could tell by Mary\'s accent that she wasn\'t a native speaker.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary will go to the mountains or to the beach.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know what you\'re talking about.
Tom doesn\'t have a cat. However, Tom does have a dog, doesn\'t he?
I have better things to do than sit around all day waiting for Tom.
I have many visas in my passport because I travel a lot for my job.
I met someone the other day that I think I could fall in love with.
I spent three weeks in this hospital when I was thirteen years old.
I don\'t feel like going to the movies. Let\'s take a walk instead.
Most car accidents happen because drivers aren\'t paying attention.
The boy who\'s swimming over there with Mary is my younger brother.
If you put more tea leaves into the pot, the tea will taste better.
It took me more than two hours to translate a few pages of English.
I never for a moment imagined that my blog would become so popular.
I tried to reach you on the phone, but I was unable to get through.
Tom drank a lot at the party and ended up making a fool of himself.
Tom dropped out of school and started working when he was thirteen.
Tom grabbed the half-eaten burrito from Mary and started eating it.
Tom had a big bruise on his forehead after he walked into the door.
